titles.title: A bill to reduce Government spending by $100,000,000,000 each fiscal year until a balanced Federal budget is achieved.

action.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

bill.summary: 7/1/1994--Introduced. Requires the Congress, beginning with FY 1995, to reduce Government spending by $100 billion each fiscal year until a balanced budget is achieved. Makes such reductions permanent. Sets forth sequestration procedures if such savings are not achieved.
